TITLE: Episode 104 - Strengthening the Individual, Literally, w/ MindPump Sal
DESCRIPTION: The Vixens ended 2021 speaking to Sal DiStefano of MindPump Media and their MindPump podcast - the most popular fitness podcast in the world. He’s been working in the health and fitness industry for most of his life, and we had a wonderful conversation about what being mindful and health conscious will do for your body, mind, and spirit, and why the government would be so keen on preventing you from being your most independently healthy self. Happy New Year, Vixies!
